title: Goal Setting - Soldier Fitness
creator: Mobile Apps Branch, ACD, CDID, Signal CoE

extendedInfo.description: As a part of the US Army Comprehensive Soldier Fitness (CSF) program, setting goals is one of the keys to creating resilient Soldiers.While our Army remains engaged in this era of persistent conflict, it is more important than ever to maintain balance in our lives. Building resiliency into lifeâs daily routine will assure balance and make you a better leader, parent, and citizen. The CSF program will prepare you for the challenges that lie ahead. As we move down this shared road, it is my great privilege to serve alongside each of you. Together we are ushering in a new generation of freedom for our nation, and other nations of the world.As you work your way through this book with your first line leaders, I challenge you to put into practice the principles you learn. Resiliency combined with effective Goal Setting will be the key to your success. They are proven, scientific methods that will enable you to overcome the adversities that find their way into your life. Make no mistake; adversity will come. How you deal with it will shape your life and the lives of those around you forever.The app was created by the FA53 Mobile Applications Branch.

reviews.title: Needs update
reviews.comment: This app looks great, however I mirror other comments. Next button does not work and no print. Here it is a year after release and no change
reviews.author: Robert Wolski

reviews.title: Nothing to it.. No Meat
reviews.comment: A very basic book.  Not much planning was put into this application
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great start but...
reviews.comment: ...I had trouble with the app when I was trying to click \"next\" through the Goals Circle. Great product though as I started out with a hard copy version back in 2002!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is a crap app
reviews.comment: This approach on android does not have half of the functionality that it does on iPad. Please fix this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs export
reviews.comment: This app needs an export or e-mail function regarding the goal setting function. What good is filling out the worksheet if I can\'t print it out to use?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Oh wow!
reviews.comment: This app is pretty neat! Would be nice to have the ability to store multiple goals though.
reviews.author: A Google User
